item.title: ISLR Chapter 3: Linear Regression (Part 1: Simple Linear Regression)
item.description: Linear Regression Linear Regression is a useful tool for predicting a quantitative response. 3.1 Simple Linear Regression Simple linear regression is a straightforward approach for predicting a quantitative response on the basis of a single predictor variable. Mathematically it can be written as: $$Y \approx \beta_0 + \beta_1 X$$ $\beta_0$ and $\beta_1$ represent intercept and slope and are called as model coefficients or parameters.
